attributes.action: ban rap music as it encourages gang culture
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The kids on council estates who get involved in gangs are often (and too easily) influenced by rap music, with obscene and vile lyrics promoting gun use, murder and rape etc..

We hereby petition the Prime Minister to ban this music - not only does it have no use in our society but it will make public transport a lot better, as rap is often played out loud by delinquent youths seeking attention.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
